entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 28 April 2023
